titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Bette Lee Republican National Convention Photographs PHOTOS.193

publicationstmt.publisher: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2013-03-07T12:48-0500

change.item: Edited by Mary Corcoran for compliance with DACS and Tamiment Required Elements for Archival Description

did.unittitle: Bette Lee Republican National Convention Photographs

repository.corpname: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive

did.abstract: The Bette Lee Republican National Convention Photographs document protests against the 2004 Republican National Convention in New York City.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: The Bette Lee Republican National Convention Photographs contain 24 photographs shot during the 2004 Republican National Convention in New York City. Captions written by Lee located on the reverse of each photograph identify the various parties depicted.

processinfo.head: Processing Information Note
processinfo.p: The Bette Lee Republican National Convention Photographs were rehoused in a shared box in February 2013.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation Note
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; Bette Lee Republican National Convention Photographs; PHOTOS 193; box number; folder number; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition Note
acqinfo.p: The Tamiment Library purchased the Bette Lee Republican National Convention Photographs from Bette Lee on December 18, 2004.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:

New York, NY 10012

bioghist.head: Historical/Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Photographer and activist Bette Lee began documenting struggles for social justice in 1980. Since then she has photographed peace work, labor struggles, protests for LGBTQ rights, immigrants rights, and campaigns against racism, among other subjects.

arrangement.head: Arrangement Note
arrangement.p: The Bette Lee Republican National Convention Photographs are ordered chronologically within a single folder.
